name: Optalk.ai LLM Pipelines
description: Domain-specific LLM fine-tuning, RAG (LangGraph), OCR citation extraction; reduced chat latency by 85% via backend refactors.

name: Protein Subcellular Localization (ML)
description: ML pipeline to predict protein subcellular localization in Gram-positive bacteria (87.24% accuracy).

name: Human Activity Recognition
description: CNN/LSTM/Transformers on mPOSE-21 and UCI HAR with strong F1/accuracy metrics.

name: ComicBot (Research)
description: Chatbot that generates jokes + GIFs using knowBERT, sarcasm detection, EmotionGIF dataset.
